com.jagacy
Class Location

java.lang.Object
  com.jagacy.Location

public final class Location
extends java.lang.Object

This class is a holder for location information.

Since:
Jagacy 3270 1.2, Jagacy VT 1.0
Author:
Robert M. Preston
See Also:
AbstractSession.readCursorLocation(), Field.getLocation()
